rules.text: No bullying, harassment, hate speech or other behavior intended to cause distress or harm. How do we define these things? Completely arbitrarily per our own priors.
No attacking other people or their accounts without their permission. If you do have permission, have fun.
Please plan to responsibly disclose whatever issues you discover to the Mastodon team: https://docs.joinmastodon.org/dev/disclosure/
Just be nice to each other
